answers.answer: There are no doctors on this diabetes forum.
JUST LOOKING FOR INFO AND OPINIONS FROM ANYONE WITH EXPERIENCE.DOESN'T HAVE TO BE A DR.

question: I have dry gangrene on my right great toe. what is the best way to treat this?  One dr. says let it dry up and comeoff itself.  Other dr says amputation.I've had the dry hard place over most of my toe about 6 months.
title: gangrene
